pr_title: Fix DDR errors cause by OMRs OMR_THR_YIELD_ALG checks

timeline.bodyText:
Please fix this comment:

POSIX and OMR should be upper-case
the sentence should end with a period
multi-line comments should begin each line with *
the end of the comment should be on a line by itself

/*
 * Assume we have POSIX priority scheduling, so OMR
 * doesn't complain it can't implement THREAD_YIELD_NEW.
 */
timeline.author: keithc-ca
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -19,3 +19,11 @@
  *
  * SPDX-License-Identifier: EPL-2.0 OR Apache-2.0 OR GPL-2.0 WITH Classpath-exception-2.0 OR LicenseRef-GPL-2.0 WITH Assembly-exception
  *******************************************************************************/
+
+#ifndef UNISTD_H
+#define UNISTD_H
+
+/* Assume we have posix priority scheduling, so omr
+   doesn't complain it can't implement THREAD_YIELD_NEW */

timeline.message:
Fix DDR errors cause by OMRs OMR_THR_YIELD_ALG checks

Signed-off-by: Devin Nakamura <devinn@ca.ibm.com>

Fix DDR errors cause by OMRs OMR_THR_YIELD_ALG checks

Signed-off-by: Devin Nakamura <devinn@ca.ibm.com>
